article.headline: St. Bonaventure 81, Rhode Island 74
article.story: BONAVENTURE, N.Y. -- Jonathan Hall scored 16 points and grabbed 10 rebounds to help lead St. Bonaventure past Rhode Island 81-74 on Saturday. The Bonnies (13-14, 6-8 Atlantic 10 Conference) shot 55.1 percent from the field (27 of 49), 46.2 percent from 3-point range (6 of 13) and 91.3 percent from the free throw line (21 of 23) in their third straight win. Ogo Adegboye and Michael Davenport added 14 points each for St. Bonaventure, Chris Matthews chipped in 12 and Andrew Nicholson had 11. The Bonnies led 44-34 at halftime, and the Rams (20-7, 8-6) tied it at 57-57 on Akeem Richmond's 3 with 10:29 left. It remained close as Keith Cothran's layup pulled Rhode Island within 71-70 with 2:14 left. The Bonnies then went 8 of 8 from the free throw line the rest of the way to seal it. Cothran finished with 17 points and Marquis Jones and Will Martell added 12 each for the Rams.

statistics.description: The number of points scored.

statistics.description: Field Goal makes and attempts.

statistics.description: Free Throw makes and attempts.

statistics.name: assists
statistics.description: The number of times a player who passes the ball to a teammate in a way that leads to a score by field goal, meaning that he or she was "assisting" in the basket. There is some judgment involved in deciding whether a passer should be credited with an assist.

statistics.name: turnovers
statistics.description: The number of times a player loses possession to the other team.

statistics.description: The total number of minutes played.

statistics.description: The average number of assists a player or team records per turnover

statistics.description: The number of times when the defense obtains the possession of the ball after a missed shot by the offense.
